name: THE IRON STAR
description:
the game is not ready yet been working on this game by myself for about almost 2 years but I am getting burnout from working on this so I am gonna post it and work on more later when I get a team

this game was going to be a co-op where you and a friend can choose 1 of 3 characters for co-op 1 character is very fast and has great movement one has great combat but is slow and the last is a balance of both and when playing singleplayer you get a 4th playable characters that about stealth

to view, the controls just press ESC when you have started the game and selected a character
